content: Does anyone know where this exists, if at all?
@Giorgio Cangioli @Rik Smithies @Jean Duteau , others?
The EMA SPOR page seem quite outdated on that part. And I've seens several candidate codes, but it's a mistery where those come from. Any help would be appreciated

In the presentations I heard in the recent past in UNICOM it has been told that "next week" will be published in the spor site... but nothing is there :-). Maybe @Rik Smithies has more updated infos .
The Veterinary part of SPOR successfully went live in January, and I assume that includes SMS. But it is not publicly accessible as far as I know. Not sure what the plans are around that.
